title: 84 Cấu trúc câu trong tiếng Anh & Phrasal Verb từ A - W

sections.title: 84 CẤU TRÚC CÂU TRONG TIẾNG ANH

structures.structure: S + V + too + adj/adv + (for someone) + to do something
examples: This structure is too easy for you to remember.
He ran too fast for me to follow.

structures.structure: S + V + so + adj/adv + that + S + V
examples: This box is so heavy that I cannot take it.
He speaks so soft that we can't hear anything.

structures.structure: It + V + such + (a/an) + N(s) + that + S + V
examples: It is such a heavy box that I cannot take it.
It is such interesting books that I cannot ignore them at all.

structures.structure: S + V + adj/adv + enough + (for someone) + to do something
structures.meaning: Đủ... cho ai đó làm gì...
examples: She is old enough to get married.
They are intelligent enough for me to teach them English.

structures.meaning: nhờ ai hoặc thuê ai làm gì...
examples: I had my hair cut yesterday.
I'd like to have my shoes repaired.

structures.structure: It + be + time + S + V(-ed, cột 2) / It's + time + for someone + to do something
structures.meaning: đã đến lúc ai đó phải làm gì...
examples: It is time you had a shower.
It's time for me to ask all of you for this question.

structures.structure: It + takes/took + someone + amount of time + to do something
structures.meaning: làm gì... mất bao nhiêu thời gian...
examples: It takes me 5 minutes to get to school.
It took him 10 minutes to do this exercise yesterday.

structures.meaning: ngăn cản ai/ cái gì... làm gì..
examples: He prevented us from parking our car here.

structures.structure: S + find + it + adj + to do something
examples: I find it very difficult to learn about English.
They found it easy to overcome that problem.

structures.meaning: Thích cái gì làm gì hơn cái gì/ làm gì
examples: I prefer dog to cat.
I prefer reading books to watching TV.

structures.structure: Would rather ('d rather) + V (infinitive) + than + V (infinitive)
structures.meaning: thích làm gì hơn làm gì
examples: She would play games than read books.
I'd rather learn English than learn Biology.
I am used to eating with chopsticks.

structures.meaning: Thường làm gì trong qk và bây giờ không làm nữa
examples: I used to go fishing with my friend when I was young.
She used to smoke 10 cigarettes a day.

structures.structure: To be amazed at = to be surprised at + N/V-ing
examples: I was amazed at his big beautiful villa.
Her mother was very angry at her bad marks.

structures.structure: to be good at/ bad at + N/V-ing
examples: I am good at swimming.
He is very bad at English.
I met her in Paris by chance last week.
My mother was tired of doing too much housework everyday.

structures.meaning: Không chịu nỗi không nhịn được làm gì...
examples: She can't stand laughing at her little dog.

structures.structure: to be keen on/ to be fond of + N/V-ing
examples: My younger sister is fond of playing with her dolls.
Mrs Brown is interested in going shopping on Sundays.

structures.meaning: tốn tiền hoặc thời gian làm gì
examples: He always wastes time playing computer games each day.
Sometimes, I waste a lot of money buying clothes.

structures.structure: To spend + amount of time/money + V-ing
structures.meaning: dành bao nhiêu thời gian làm gì..
examples: I spend 2 hours reading books a day.
Mr Jim spent a lot of money traveling around the world last year.

structures.structure: To spend + amount of time/money + on + something
structures.meaning: dành thời gian vào việc gì...
examples: My mother often spends 2 hours on housework everyday.
She spent all of her money on clothes.

structures.meaning: từ bỏ làm gì/ cái gì...
examples: You should give up smoking as soon as possible.
I would like to go to the cinema with you tonight.

structures.meaning: có cái gì đó để làm
examples: I have many things to do this week.
It is Tom who got the best marks in my class.
It is the villa that he had to spend a lot of money last year.
You had better go to see the doctor.

structures.structure: hate/ like/ dislike/ enjoy/ avoid/ finish/ mind/ postpone/ practise/ consider/ delay/ deny/ suggest/ risk/ keep/ imagine/ fancy + V-ing
examples: I always practise speaking English everyday.

structures.structure: It is + tính từ + (for smb) + to do smt
structures.meaning: Người có tuổi học tiếng Anh thì khó
examples: It is difficult for old people to learn English.

structures.meaning: Thích cái gì / làm cái gì
examples: We are interested in reading books on history.
We are bored with doing the same things everyday.

structures.structure: It's the first time smb have (has) + PII smt
structures.meaning: Đây là lần đầu tiên ai làm cái gì
examples: It's the first time we have visited this place.
I don't have enough time to study.
I'm not rich enough to buy a car.

structures.structure: too + tính từ + to do smt
structures.meaning: Quá làm sao để làm cái gì
examples: I'm to young to get married.

structures.structure: To want smb to do smt = To want to have smt + PII
structures.meaning: Muốn ai làm gì / Muốn có cái gì được làm
examples: She wants someone to make her a dress.
= She wants to have a dress made.

structures.meaning: Đã đến lúc ai phải làm gì
examples: It's time we went home.

structures.structure: It's not necessary for smb to do smt = Smb don't need to do smt / doesn't have to do smt
structures.meaning: Ai không cần thiết phải làm gì
examples: It is not necessary for you to do this exercise.

structures.meaning: Mong chờ, mong đợi làm gì
examples: We are looking forward to going on holiday.

structures.meaning: Cung cấp cho ai cái gì
examples: Can you provide us with some books in history?

structures.structure: To prevent smb from V_ing / To stop
examples: The rain stopped us from going for a walk.

structures.meaning: Không làm được cái gì / Thất bại trong việc làm cái gì
examples: We failed to do this exercise.

structures.meaning: Thành công trong việc làm cái gì
examples: We were succeed in passing the exam.
She borrowed this book from the liblary.
Can you lend me some money?
The teacher made us do a lot of homework.

structures.structure: CN + be + so + tính từ + that + S + động từ / CN + động từ + so + trạng từ
examples: The exercise is so difficult that noone can do it.
He spoke so quickly that I couldn't understand him.

structures.structure: CN + be + such + (tính từ) + danh từ + that + CN + động từ
examples: It is such a difficult exercise that noone can do it.

structures.structure: It is (very) kind of smb to do smt
structures.meaning: Ai thật tốt bụng / tử tế khi làm gì
examples: It is very kind of you to help me.

structures.structure: To find it + tính từ + to do smt
examples: We find it difficult to learn English.

structures.structure: To make sure of smt / that + CN + động từ
examples: I have to make sure of that information.
You have to make sure that you'll pass the exam.

structures.structure: It takes (smb) + thời gian + to do smt
structures.meaning: Mất (của ai) bao nhiêu thời gian để làm gì
examples: It took me an hour to do this exercise.

structures.structure: To spend + time/money + on smt / doing smt
structures.meaning: Dành thời gian / tiền bạc vào cái gì / làm gì
examples: We spend a lot of time on TV.
We spend a lot of time watching TV.

structures.structure: To have no idea of smt = don't know about smt
examples: I have no idea of this word.

structures.structure: To advise smb to do smt / not to do smt
structures.meaning: Khuyên ai làm gì / không làm gì
examples: Our teacher advises us to study hard.

structures.structure: To plan to do smt / intend to do smt
structures.meaning: Dự định / có kế hoạch làm gì
examples: We planed to go for a picnic.

structures.structure: To invite smb to do smt
examples: They invited me to go to the cinema.

structures.meaning: Mời / đề nghị ai cái gì
examples: He offered me a job in his company.

structures.meaning: tin cậy, dựa dẫm vào ai
examples: You can rely on him.
He always keeps promises.

structures.structure: To be able to do smt = To be capable of + V_ing
examples: I'm able to speak English.
I am capable of speaking English.

structures.structure: To be good at (+ V_ing) smt
examples: I'm good at (playing) tennis.

structures.structure: To prefer smt to smt / doing smt to doing smt
structures.meaning: Thích cái gì hơn cái gì / làm gì hơn làm gì
examples: We prefer spending money than earning money.

structures.meaning: Xin lỗi ai vì đã làm gì
examples: I want to apologize for being rude to you.

structures.structure: Had ('d) better do smt / not do smt
structures.meaning: Nên làm gì / Không nên làm gì
examples: You'd better learn hard.
You'd better not go out.

structures.structure: Would ('d) rather do smt / not do smt
structures.meaning: Thà làm gì / đừng làm gì
examples: I'd rather stay at home.
I'd rather not stay at home.
I'd rather you (he/she) stayed at home today.
I suggested she (should) buy this house.
I suggested going for a walk.
We tried to learn hard.
We tried cooking this food.
You need to work harder.
This car needs repairing.
I remember seeing this film.

structures.meaning: Nhớ làm gì (chưa làm cái này)
examples: Remember to do your homework.

structures.structure: To have smt + PII / To have smb do smt
structures.meaning: Có cái gì được làm / Thuê ai làm gì
examples: I'm going to have my house repainted.
I'm going to have the garage repair my car.
I'm going to have my car repaired.
We are busy preparing for our exam.
Do / Would you mind closing the door for me?

structures.structure: To be used to doing smt
examples: We are used to getting up early.
We stopped to buy some petrol.
We stopped going out late.
Let him come in.

sections.title: CÁCH SỬ DỤNG CÁC GIỚI TỪ

prepositions.usage: trong suốt (hoạt động diễn ra liên tục)
examples: He works part time during the summer.

prepositions.usage: từ... đến... (dùng cho thời gian và nơi chốn)
examples: I will collect data from January to June.

prepositions.usage: ra khỏi, hết, không còn, đi vắng, cũ, lạc hậu, thất nghiệp, không thể, hỏng
examples: When we walked out of the hotel, the taxi was waiting for us.
We're out of milk.
My dad is out of town on business.
This technology is out of date.
He has been out of work for a year.
A trip to the moon is out of the question for most people.
The elevator is out of order again.

prepositions.usage: đi ngang qua, ở gần, trước lúc, bằng (phương tiện), cho đến lúc đó, theo đường, tình cờ, nhấn mạnh so sánh
examples: He walked by the library.
Your books are by the window.
You must return your book by April 21st.
I go to work by train.
By the way, have you seen my keys?
She is by far the best student in the class.

prepositions.usage: bên trong, tháng/năm, đúng giờ, trên đường, buổi, quá khứ/tương lai, từ nay trở đi, lúc đầu/cuối, cản lối, thỉnh thoảng, trong nháy mắt, cùng lúc, ở giữa, trong quân đội, hàng thứ, trong trường hợp, để phòng khi, liên lạc
examples: The clothes are in the wardrobe.
The weather is cold in December.
She was born in 1996.
We arrived just in time for the movie.
There's a market on James Street. (Note: A.E usage differs from B.E 'in the street')
He reads in the evening.
In the past, people wrote letters.
In the beginning, I was nervous.

prepositions.usage: trên bề mặt, thứ/ngày, trên phương tiện, địa chỉ phố, tầng, đúng giờ, góc phố, vỉa hè, trên đường, bên phải/trái, trên TV/radio, nói chuyện điện thoại, có điện thoại, nói chung, tuy nhiên, một mặt/mặt khác, để bán, bán hạ giá, đi bộ
examples: The books are on the desk.
I work on Saturdays.
He's on the bus now.
We live on the fifth floor.
The train arrived on time.
The shop is on the corner of the street.
My favorite show is on TV tonight.
I prefer to go on foot.

prepositions.usage: tại, số nhà, thời gian cụ thể, nhà/trường/công sở, đêm/trưa, tối thiểu/tối đa, ngay lập tức, bây giờ, ngay tức thì, ngay sau đó, ở đầu/cuối, ngày lễ, địa điểm, các toà nhà lớn, tổ chức, trường sở, hoạt động nhóm
examples: I live at 15 Craig Street.
I go to work at 8:00.
She's working at home today.
She often goes for a walk at night.
He eats lunch at noon.
At least you tried your best.
Please call me at once.
We met at a party.
We spent the day relaxing on the beach.
We walked along the beach at sunset.
You can use honey in place of sugar.
For the most part, the students are well-behaved.
He studied hard in hope of getting a scholarship.
It rained off and on all day.
All of a sudden, the lights went out.
She's leaving the city for good.

sections.title: 51 CẤU TRÚC SO SÁNH TRONG TIẾNG ANH

comparison_structures.structure: S + V + (not) enough + noun + (for sb) to do st
comparison_structures.meaning: (không) đủ cái gì để (cho ai) làm gì.
examples: He doesn't have enough qualification to work here.

comparison_structures.structure: S + V + (not) adj/adv + enough + (for sb) to do st
comparison_structures.meaning: cái gì đó (không) đủ để (cho ai) làm gì.
examples: He doesn't study hard enough to pass the exam.

comparison_structures.structure: S + V + too + adj/adv + (for sb) to do st
comparison_structures.meaning: cái gì quá đến nỗi làm sao để cho ai đấy làm gì.
examples: He ran too fast for me to catch up with.

comparison_structures.meaning: để mà
examples: He studied very hard so that he could pas the test.

comparison_structures.structure: S + V + so + adj/adv + that + S + V
comparison_structures.meaning: cái gì đó quá làm sao đến nỗi mà
examples: The film was so boring that he fell asleep in the middle of it.

comparison_structures.structure: It + V + such + [a(n)] adj noun + that + S + V
comparison_structures.meaning: cái gì đó quá làm sao đến nỗi mà
examples: It was such a borring film that he fell asleep in the middle of it.

comparison_structures.structure: If + S + present simple + S + will/can/may + V simple
comparison_structures.meaning: câu điều kiện loại 1 = điều kiện có thật ở tương lai
examples: If you lie in the sun too long, you will get sunburnt.

comparison_structures.structure: If + S + past simple + S + would + V simple
comparison_structures.meaning: Câu điều kiện loại 2 = miêu tả cái không có thực hoặc tưởng tượng ra
examples: If I won the competition, I would spend it all.

comparison_structures.structure: If + S + past perfect + S + would + have past participle
comparison_structures.meaning: câu điều kiện loại 3 = miêu tả cái không xảy ra hoặc tưởng tượng xảy ra trong quá khứ
examples: If I'd worked harder, I would have passed the exam.

comparison_structures.meaning: trừ phi, nếu không
examples: You will be late unless you start at one.

comparison_structures.meaning: chỉ thói quen, hành động trong quá khứ
examples: He used to smoke, but he gave up five months ago.

comparison_structures.meaning: quen với việc
examples: I am used to eating at 7:00 PM.

comparison_structures.meaning: trở nên quen với việc ...
examples: We got used to American food.

comparison_structures.meaning: thích cái gì (làm gì ) hơn cái gì (làm gì)
examples: We would rather die in freedom than lie in slavery.

comparison_structures.meaning: thích cái gì (làm gì ) hơn cái gì (làm gì)
examples: I prefer drinking Coca to drinking Pepsi.

comparison_structures.meaning: tạo lời mời hoặc ý muốn gì
examples: Would you like to dance with me?

comparison_structures.meaning: diễn đạt sở thích / diễn đạt thói quen, sự lựa chọn, hoặc với nghĩa cho là đúng
examples: He like reading novel.
When making tea, he usually likes to put sugar and a slice of lemon in fisrt.

comparison_structures.structure: S + should/had better/ought to/be supposed to + do
comparison_structures.meaning: ai đó nên làm gì.
examples: He should study tonight.
He had better study tonight.
He is supposed to study tonight.

comparison_structures.meaning: có lẽ đã
examples: It may have rained last night, but I'm not sure.

comparison_structures.meaning: lẽ ra phải, lẽ ra nên
examples: Tom should have gone to office this morning.
Tai was worried because it had started to rain.
Tai was worried because of the rain.

comparison_structures.meaning: mặc dù
examples: Jane will be admitted to the university although she has bad grades.

comparison_structures.structure: to be made of = consist of
comparison_structures.meaning: được làm bằng – đề cập đến chất liệu làm vật
examples: This table is made of wood.

comparison_structures.meaning: được làm từ – đề cập đến nguyên vật liệu bị biến đổi khỏi trạng thái ban đầu.
examples: Paper is made from wood.

comparison_structures.meaning: được làm bằng – đề cập đến quá trình làm ra vật .
examples: This cake was made out of flour, butter, sugar, eggs and milk.

comparison_structures.structure: to have sb do sth = to get sb to do sth
comparison_structures.meaning: sai ai, bảo ai làm gì
examples: I'll have Vinh fix my car.
I'll get Vinh to fix my car.

comparison_structures.structure: to have / to get sth done
comparison_structures.meaning: làm gì bằng cách thuê người khác
examples: I have my car washed.

comparison_structures.structure: to make sb do sth = to force sb to do sth
comparison_structures.meaning: Bắt buộc ai làm gì
examples: The bank robbers make the maneger give them all the money.

comparison_structures.meaning: làm cho ai bị làm sao
examples: Working all night on Friday made me tired on Saturday.

comparison_structures.meaning: làm cho cái gì bị làm sao
examples: The big thunder storm caused waterfront houses damaged.

comparison_structures.structure: to let sb do sth = to permit/allow sb to do sth
comparison_structures.meaning: để cho ai, cho phép ai làm gì
examples: I let me go.

comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh ngang bằng
examples: My book is as interesting as yours.
Vinh sings as well as I.

comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh hơn
examples: My grades are higher than Vinh's.

comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh hơn
examples: He speaks English more fluently than I.

comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh kém
examples: He visits his family less frequently than she does.

comparison_structures.structure: S + V + the + short{adj/adv}_est + {in + singular count noun/ of + plural count noun}
comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh bậc nhất
examples: Tom is the tallest in the family.

comparison_structures.structure: S + V + the + most + long{adj/adv} + {in + singular count noun/ of + plural count noun}
comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh bậc nhất
examples: This shoes is the most expensive of all.

comparison_structures.structure: S + V + the + least + long{adj/adv} + {in + singular count noun/ of + plural count noun}
comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh bậc nhất
examples: This shoes is the least expensive of all.

comparison_structures.structure: S + V + number multiple + as + {much/many} + (noun) + as + {noun/pronoun}
comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh bội số 'gấp 2, gấp 3...'
examples: This pen costs twice as much as the other one.

comparison_structures.structure: The + comparative + S + V + the + comparative + S + V
comparison_structures.meaning: so sánh kép
examples: The more you study, the smatter you will become.

comparison_structures.structure: No sooner + auxiliary + S + V + than + S + V
comparison_structures.meaning: vừa mới ....thì đã...
examples: No sooner had we started out for Obama than it started to rain.

comparison_structures.meaning: toV khi S là vật thể sống, V_ing khi S không là vật thể sống
examples: The grass needs cutting.
I need to learn English.

comparison_structures.meaning: V1 là {agree, expect, hope, learn, refuse, want, demand, forget, attempt, offer, seem, fail, desire, plan, prepare}.
examples: I hope to see you soon.

comparison_structures.meaning: V1 là {admit, avoid, delay, deny, resist, postpone, miss, finish, enjoy, suggest, mind, recall, risk, resume, quit, consider}.
examples: I enjoy playing the piano.

comparison_structures.structure: S + wish + (that) + S + {could V/ would V/ were V_ing} + ...
comparison_structures.meaning: ước ở tương lai
examples: We wish that you could come to the party to night.

comparison_structures.structure: S + wish + (that) + S + {past perfect/could have P2}....
comparison_structures.meaning: ước ở quá khứ
examples: I wish that I had washed the clothes yesterday.
Students account for the vast majority of our customers.
You should allow for delays when planning a journey.
He always asks after you in his letters.
She asked for a glass of water.
Don't leave him on the doorstep, ask him in!
He's too shy to ask her out.

A.meaning: thuyết phục ai làm gì/không làm gì
examples: They urged him into accepting the new job.
She has advanced greatly in her studies.
The lawyer advanced a new theory.
The army advanced to the river.
We couldn't agree on a price.

A.meaning: đồng ý với ai, hợp với, tốt cho
examples: I agree with you.
That food doesn't agree with me.
He answers to the description of the wanted man.
You will have to answer for your actions.
Two nurses attended on the patient.
You should attend to what the teacher is saying.
The storm is over now.

B.verb: to be up to sb to V
B.meaning: ai đó có trách nhiệm phải làm gì
examples: It's up to you to decide.
He's bearing up well under the strain.
The evidence bears out the defendant's story.
He blew out all 30 candles on his birthday cake.
The strong wind blew the fence down.
The scandal will soon blow over.
The prisoner broke away from his guards.

B.meaning: hỏng hóc, suy nhược, òa khóc
examples: My car broke down on the motorway.
She broke down in tears.
Someone broke into our house last night.
She broke in on our conversation.
They decided to break up.
The meeting broke up at 4 p.m.

B.meaning: tan vỡ một mối quan hệ, dừng lại đột ngột
examples: They broke off their engagement.
He broke off in the middle of a sentence.

B.meaning: mang đến, mang lại (= result in)
examples: The new policy brought about many changes.
They managed to bring down the helicopter safely.
The company is bringing out a new product next month.
That color brings out the blue in your eyes.
She was brought up by her grandparents.
Don't bring up that topic again.
It was a difficult task, but they brought it off.
The candles burned away.
The building was completely burned out.
If he doesn't stop working so hard, he'll burn himself out.
My family backed me up in my decision.

B.meaning: có ảnh hưởng, liên quan tới
examples: This information may bear on the case.

B.meaning: xảy ra cho, số phận ra sao
examples: What will become of him now?
Let's begin with the first chapter.
The course begins at 9 a.m.
I believe in ghosts.
This book belongs to me.
I wouldn't bet on them winning the match.
The situation calls for immediate action.

C.meaning: gọi đi lính, gọi điện thoại, nhắc lại kỉ niệm
examples: He was called up to serve in the army.
I'll call you up later.
The song calls up memories of my childhood.

C.verb: Call on/call in at sb's house
examples: I think I'll call on my parents this evening.
They had to call off the match because of the rain.
Would you care for a cup of tea?
She cares for her elderly mother.
Go on ahead, I'll catch up with you later.
I chanced upon an old friend in the supermarket.
The enemy troops closed with their objective.
The bill came to $50.
She fainted but quickly came to.
The baby was crying for its mother.

C.meaning: nói vào, xen vào, cắt giảm
examples: She kept cutting into our conversation.
The new expenses will cut into our profits.
Please carry on with your work.
We need to carry out more research.

C.meaning: trở nên phổ biến, nắm bắt kịp
examples: This new hairstyle is beginning to catch on.
He's very quick to catch on to new ideas.
We need to check in two hours before the flight.
Please remember to check out before noon.
It's time to clean up your room.
I hope we can clear up this misunderstanding.
The weather is clearing up.
I came across this old photo while cleaning my room.
She came up with a great idea for the new project.
You can always count on me for help.
I'm trying to cut down on the amount of sugar I eat.
If you make a mistake, just cross it out.

D.meaning: giảm đi, dịu đi (về cường độ)
examples: The sound of the footsteps died away.
The wind has died down.
Dinosaurs died out millions of years ago.
It's time to do away with these old regulations.
We need to do up the living room.
Can you help me do up my dress?

D.meaning: làm được gì mà không cần
examples: We'll have to do without a car for a few days.
Feel free to drop in anytime you're in the neighborhood.
I must have dropped off during the movie.
Can you drop this package off at the post office?
He dropped out of school at the age of 16.
We ended up watching a movie instead of going out.
Come on, eat up your vegetables.
Let's eat out tonight.
You have to face up to your responsibilities.
If the plan fails, we can fall back on our savings.

F.meaning: chậm hơn so với dự định, rớt lại phía sau
examples: She fell behind in her studies after being ill.
Our holiday plans fell through at the last minute.
Please fill in this application form.
He filled up the car with petrol.
I need to find out what time the train leaves.
I finally got through my exams.
It was a tough year, but we got through it.

G.meaning: cởi bỏ, xuống xe, khởi hành
examples: Please get your feet off the table.
We need to get off the bus at the next stop.
This rainy weather is really getting me down.
Do you get along with your new colleagues?
He thinks he can get away with cheating on his exams.
It took him a long time to get over the flu.

G.meaning: cho đi, tiết lộ bí mật
examples: She gave away all her old clothes to charity.
Don't give away the ending of the movie.
The team refused to give in and fought until the end.
He gave up smoking last year.
Are you going out tonight?
That style of dress went out years ago.
Let's go through the report one more time.
She has gone through a lot recently.
Please go on with your story.
What do you want to be when you grow up?
This recipe has been handed down from my grandmother.
Please hand in your assignments by Friday.
The teacher handed out the worksheets.

H.meaning: cầm máy (điện thoại), chờ một chút
examples: Hang on a second, I'm almost ready.
Don't hang up on me, we need to talk.
Please hold on, I'll put you through.
Sorry I'm late, I was held up in traffic.
The bank was held up this morning.
She jumped at the chance to work abroad.
Don't jump to conclusions before you know all the facts.
Keep away from the edge of the cliff.
Please keep off the grass.
I can't keep up with him, he walks too fast.
Just keep on trying and you'll succeed.
They are going to knock down the old building.
The boxer knocked out his opponent in the first round.
I feel like I've let my parents down.
Can you look after the kids for a few hours?
I'm looking for my keys, have you seen them?
I'm looking forward to seeing you soon.

L.meaning: tra cứu (từ điển, số điện thoại)
examples: If you don't know the word, look it up in a dictionary.
The police are looking into the matter.
He's a role model that many people look up to.
She thinks they look down on her because she doesn't have a degree.

M.meaning: trang điểm, bịa chuyện, làm hòa
examples: She takes a long time to make up in the morning.
He made up a crazy story to explain his absence.
They kissed and made up after their argument.
I can't make out what he's saying.
I could just make out a figure in the darkness.
I'll buy you dinner to make up for being so late.
I owe my success to my parents.
Her grandfather passed away last year.
He passed out from the heat.
I'll pay you back as soon as I get my salary.
I'll pay you back for all the trouble you've caused me.
He pointed out the mistakes in my essay.
The old hospital is going to be pulled down.
I'm putting some money aside for a new car.
Put on your coat, it's cold outside.
I think I've put on a few pounds.
I don't know how she puts up with him.
It took the firefighters two hours to put out the fire.
Never put off until tomorrow what you can do today.
The dog ran after the cat.
We've run out of milk.
Be careful not to run over the dog.
I ran into my old teacher at the supermarket.
The car ran into a tree.
We went to the airport to see him off.
We set out for the beach early in the morning.

S.meaning: an cư lập nghiệp, ổn định
examples: They decided to settle down and start a family.
He's always showing off his new car.
He finally showed up an hour late.

S.meaning: đại diện, viết tắt của, khoan dung
examples: 'UN' stands for 'United Nations'.
I won't stand for that kind of behavior.
He takes after his father.
Don't be taken in by his charm.
I'm not sure I took in all the details.
We're taking on new staff.
I can't take on any more work right now.

T.meaning: cất cánh, cởi tháo bỏ cái gì
examples: The plane took off on time.
Please take off your shoes.

T.meaning: giành quyền kiểm soát, tiếp quản
examples: The company was taken over by a larger one.

T.meaning: bắt đầu làm gì (thú tiêu khiển), chiếm giữ (không gian)
examples: I've decided to take up yoga.
This sofa takes up too much space.
Don't throw away that old newspaper.
I'd like to try on this dress.
You can try out the new software for free.
He turned down the job offer.
Could you turn the music down?
It turned out that he was a friend of my sister.
The factory turns out 500 cars a day.
Please turn on the light.
Don't forget to turn off the computer.

T.meaning: xuất hiện, đến tới, vặn to (âm lượng)
examples: He turned up late as usual.
Can you turn the volume up a bit?
We've used up all the coffee.
I'm waiting for the bus.
Watch out! There's a car coming.

W.meaning: mất tác dụng, biến mất, nhạt dần
examples: The effects of the painkiller are starting to wear off.
All this shopping has worn me out.

W.meaning: tìm ra cách giải quyết, tập thể dục
examples: I can't work out the answer to this math problem.
I work out at the gym three times a week.
The entire village was wiped out by the flood.
Please write down your name and address.
